sentences.sContent: Coal has been displaced by natural gas as a major source of energy.
sentences.sCn: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.sContent: immigrants who displace US workers in the job market
sentences.sCn: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

synos.tran: 取代；置换；转移；把…免职；排水

remMethod.val: dis(分离) + place(位置) → 使从原位置上离开 → 取代

words.tran: 取代，移位；[船] 排水量

trans.tranOther: to take the place or position of something or someone
